title: Amazon Has Prime Day-Worthy Presidents’ Day Deals on Le Creuset, All-Clad, and Nespresso
description: Here are the best sale picks to shop right now. READ MORE...
author: Nikol Slatinska
excerpt: Here are the best sale picks to shop right now.
text: Tools & EquipmentSales & DealsNikol SlatinskaCommerce Shopping WriterI write home shopping content for Apartment Therapy. My job entails product testing and reviewing, as well as writing serviceable shopping guides for furniture and home decor. I received my undergraduate journalism degree at the University of Missouri and wrote for local publications in my college town. published nowWe independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.I used to look forward to clothing and beauty sales. But now, I get most excited about home and kitchen sales. With Presidents’ Day upon us, now’s the best time to shop all of your long-awaited big-ticket home purchases, and Amazon is a natural place to start. The online retailer has pretty much everything you could ever want when it comes to upgrading your kitchen, and a lot of it is already on sale. That includes top-brand cookware and countertop appliances, so whether you’re after a new Dutch oven or espresso machine, there’s no need to look anywhere else. Because there are so many deals, I went ahead and pulled 15 of the ones I have my eye on, including some organizers and cleaning tools that will help keep every surface spotless — including the ones you don’t always see. Be sure to add your own favorites to your cart, and snag them for less while the sale is still live.1 / 15Amazon$118.30was $169.95If your tiny kitchen could use a coffee upgrade, look no further than this Nespresso model. It has a tiny footprint and a movable water tank you can position to your liking. The machine can also brew four different cup sizes and is compatible with all pods in the Nespresso Vertuo line.2 / 15Amazon$469.99was $569.99Have your heart set on picking up a new Dyson? The V11 Origin is the way to go. It offers three cleaning modes and comes with three attachments that allow you to clean your home from top to bottom, whether you need to remove pet hair from upholstery or dust from ceiling fan blades. These features, combined with its impressive motor power, will have you sold for life on Dyson vacs.3 / 15Amazon$469.99was $550.00Apple’s AirPods Max are some of the most popular headphones on the market today, and right now you snag them for $70 off. They feature full noise cancellation, transparency mode, and easy switching between devices. But compared with previous AirPods, this version has much better sound quality. Additionally, if you dislike the feeling of foreign devices in your ears, you'll enjoy the comfortable, over-ear fit of the AirPods Max (complete with memory foam!).4 / 15Amazon$48.74was $64.99It’s no secret that the space underneath your sink can become chaotic fast. That’s why you need a great under-sink organizer, like this two-tiered design. Coming in a set of two, its L-shaped design fits around plumbing with ease, while the spacious shelving makes corralling all of your cleaning essentials as easy as 1-2-3. The best part? The bottom portion slides out for quick and easy access.5 / 15Amazon$429.95was $629.95There’s almost nothing the Vitamix Propel Series 750 blender can’t do. Whether you need to emulsify a sauce, blend a smoothie, dice veggies, or puree a soup, it’s bound to come in clutch. The machine comes with an impressive 64-ounce container and also features laser-cut, stainless-steel blades, a tamper for pushing down ingredients, a lid to reduce splatter, and five recipe settings for convenience.6 / 15Amazon$183.00was $229.00Regardless of whether you’re a novice or skilled chef, HexClad cookware is one of the best investments you can make. This sauté pan is so versatile, and it’s the perfect size if you like to have leftovers for the next day. Use it to whip up an easy and delicious breakfast or braise some chicken thighs. The nonstick interior makes for easy cleanups afterward, too.7 / 15Amazon$98.59was $123.59You'll never have to think about renting a bulky carpet cleaning machine after you pick up this small but mighty upholstery cleaner. A TikTok favorite, this device steam cleans rugs, carpets, sofas, armchairs, and car seats, and its dual spray and suction function makes sure stains are gone for good. It’s a must-have for pet owners, especially.8 / 15Amazon$277.42was $419.95It goes without saying that Le Creuset’s famous Dutch oven is perfect for all those cold-weather meals, like hearty stews, soups, and roasts — plus it’s also great for baking loaves of bread. This iconic piece boasts superior heat retention and Le Creuset’s easy-care enameled interior, which doesn’t require seasoning.9 / 15Amazon$60.00was $99.95Our staffers have tested a number of mandoline slicers, and OXO’s consistently ranks as one of the best thanks to its ease of use, stability, and versatility. Indeed, the gadget is capable of making nice, even slices no matter what kinds of veggies you’re prepping.10 / 15Amazon$349.95was $449.99Good deals on KitchenAid stand mixers are somewhat hard to come by, so we recommend grabbing this countertop staple for less while you can. The great thing about it is, you don't have to be a baker to enjoy this device — it's great for mixing all kinds of savory recipes and can be upgraded with attachments for making everything from homemade sausages to pasta to shaved ice.11 / 15Amazon$29.99was $39.99Amazon shoppers love these compact food storage containers for their BPA-free and odor- and stain-resistant material, as well as the tight-locking lids. You can also throw them in the microwave, dishwasher, or freezer without issue and take them with you on the go. They’re a no-brainer!12 / 15Amazon$99.99was $119.99An air fryer toaster oven will end up becoming your most-used appliance — it’ll replace your full-size oven, microwave, and air fryer in one fell swoop. This option from Chefman has a whopping seven functions, so it can air fry, bake, broil, toast, and more, all while taking up minimal space on your counter.13 / 15Amazon$42.40was $49.88A gorgeous rug is the easiest way to give your dining area a refresh, and thanks to this one, you can do it at a bargain price. The vintage-inspired print is gorgeous, and the low pile will hold up in high traffic areas. Plus, the material is machine-washable, so it’s great if you have pets or kids.14 / 15Amazon$19.99was $25.99How cute is this two-tiered fruit basket? Made of sturdy, rust-resistant iron, it’ll instantly corral all of your produce, though you could use it to hold other things, too. Keep packaged snacks conveniently located in the same spot, or place your cooking oils on the bottom tier for easy access during meal prep. So many options!15 / 15Amazon$55.99was $69.99All-Clad is an editor- and reader-favorite for a reason: This cookware lasts. Although the brand is known for its stainless steel, if you’re more of a nonstick fan, you’ll love this deal. This set includes an 8- and 10-inch frying pan that each boasts a wide surface and flared sides that make them great for everyday (and every meal) use.My Kitchn HelperGet our favorite editor-tested and -approved finds sent twice a week to your inbox.
html:
• Tools & Equipment
  • Sales & Deals

Nikol SlatinskaCommerce Shopping Writer

I write home shopping content for Apartment Therapy. My job entails product testing and reviewing, as well as writing serviceable shopping guides for furniture and home decor. I received my undergraduate journalism degree at the University of Missouri and wrote for local publications in my college town.

published now

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

I used to look forward to clothing and beauty sales. But now, I get most excited about home and kitchen sales. With Presidents’ Day upon us, now’s the best time to shop all of your long-awaited big-ticket home purchases, and Amazon is a natural place to start. The online retailer has pretty much everything you could ever want when it comes to upgrading your kitchen, and a lot of it is already on sale.

That includes top-brand cookware and countertop appliances, so whether you’re after a new Dutch oven or espresso machine, there’s no need to look anywhere else. Because there are so many deals, I went ahead and pulled 15 of the ones I have my eye on, including some organizers and cleaning tools that will help keep every surface spotless — including the ones you don’t always see. Be sure to add your own favorites to your cart, and snag them for less while the sale is still live.

1 / 15

Amazon

$118.30

was $169.95

If your tiny kitchen could use a coffee upgrade, look no further than this Nespresso model. It has a tiny footprint and a movable water tank you can position to your liking. The machine can also brew four different cup sizes and is compatible with all pods in the Nespresso Vertuo line.

2 / 15

Amazon

$469.99

was $569.99

Have your heart set on picking up a new Dyson? The V11 Origin is the way to go. It offers three cleaning modes and comes with three attachments that allow you to clean your home from top to bottom, whether you need to remove pet hair from upholstery or dust from ceiling fan blades. These features, combined with its impressive motor power, will have you sold for life on Dyson vacs.

3 / 15

Amazon

$469.99

was $550.00

Apple’s AirPods Max are some of the most popular headphones on the market today, and right now you snag them for $70 off. They feature full noise cancellation, transparency mode, and easy switching between devices. But compared with previous AirPods, this version has much better sound quality. Additionally, if you dislike the feeling of foreign devices in your ears, you'll enjoy the comfortable, over-ear fit of the AirPods Max (complete with memory foam!).

4 / 15

Amazon

$48.74

was $64.99

It’s no secret that the space underneath your sink can become chaotic fast. That’s why you need a great under-sink organizer, like this two-tiered design. Coming in a set of two, its L-shaped design fits around plumbing with ease, while the spacious shelving makes corralling all of your cleaning essentials as easy as 1-2-3. The best part? The bottom portion slides out for quick and easy access.

5 / 15

Amazon

$429.95

was $629.95

There’s almost nothing the Vitamix Propel Series 750 blender can’t do. Whether you need to emulsify a sauce, blend a smoothie, dice veggies, or puree a soup, it’s bound to come in clutch. The machine comes with an impressive 64-ounce container and also features laser-cut, stainless-steel blades, a tamper for pushing down ingredients, a lid to reduce splatter, and five recipe settings for convenience.

6 / 15

Amazon

$183.00

was $229.00

Regardless of whether you’re a novice or skilled chef, HexClad cookware is one of the best investments you can make. This sauté pan is so versatile, and it’s the perfect size if you like to have leftovers for the next day. Use it to whip up an easy and delicious breakfast or braise some chicken thighs. The nonstick interior makes for easy cleanups afterward, too.

7 / 15

Amazon

$98.59

was $123.59

You'll never have to think about renting a bulky carpet cleaning machine after you pick up this small but mighty upholstery cleaner. A TikTok favorite, this device steam cleans rugs, carpets, sofas, armchairs, and car seats, and its dual spray and suction function makes sure stains are gone for good. It’s a must-have for pet owners, especially.

8 / 15

Amazon

$277.42

was $419.95

It goes without saying that Le Creuset’s famous Dutch oven is perfect for all those cold-weather meals, like hearty stews, soups, and roasts — plus it’s also great for baking loaves of bread. This iconic piece boasts superior heat retention and Le Creuset’s easy-care enameled interior, which doesn’t require seasoning.

9 / 15

Amazon

$60.00

was $99.95

Our staffers have tested a number of mandoline slicers, and OXO’s consistently ranks as one of the best thanks to its ease of use, stability, and versatility. Indeed, the gadget is capable of making nice, even slices no matter what kinds of veggies you’re prepping.

10 / 15

Amazon

$349.95

was $449.99

Good deals on KitchenAid stand mixers are somewhat hard to come by, so we recommend grabbing this countertop staple for less while you can. The great thing about it is, you don't have to be a baker to enjoy this device — it's great for mixing all kinds of savory recipes and can be upgraded with attachments for making everything from homemade sausages to pasta to shaved ice.

11 / 15

Amazon

$29.99

was $39.99

Amazon shoppers love these compact food storage containers for their BPA-free and odor- and stain-resistant material, as well as the tight-locking lids. You can also throw them in the microwave, dishwasher, or freezer without issue and take them with you on the go. They’re a no-brainer!

12 / 15

Amazon

$99.99

was $119.99

An air fryer toaster oven will end up becoming your most-used appliance — it’ll replace your full-size oven, microwave, and air fryer in one fell swoop. This option from Chefman has a whopping seven functions, so it can air fry, bake, broil, toast, and more, all while taking up minimal space on your counter.

13 / 15

Amazon

$42.40

was $49.88

A gorgeous rug is the easiest way to give your dining area a refresh, and thanks to this one, you can do it at a bargain price. The vintage-inspired print is gorgeous, and the low pile will hold up in high traffic areas. Plus, the material is machine-washable, so it’s great if you have pets or kids.

14 / 15

Amazon

$19.99

was $25.99

How cute is this two-tiered fruit basket? Made of sturdy, rust-resistant iron, it’ll instantly corral all of your produce, though you could use it to hold other things, too. Keep packaged snacks conveniently located in the same spot, or place your cooking oils on the bottom tier for easy access during meal prep. So many options!

15 / 15

Amazon

$55.99

was $69.99

All-Clad is an editor- and reader-favorite for a reason: This cookware lasts. Although the brand is known for its stainless steel, if you’re more of a nonstick fan, you’ll love this deal. This set includes an 8- and 10-inch frying pan that each boasts a wide surface and flared sides that make them great for everyday (and every meal) use.

My Kitchn Helper

Get our favorite editor-tested and -approved finds sent twice a week to your inbox.
